function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific measures or laws regarding identification and protection of critical infrastructure","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of critical infrastructure to potential threats and disruptions","Mitigation":"Establishing specific measures and laws for the identification and protection of critical infrastructure","Technologies":"Policy development, legislation, and regulatory frameworks","People":"Citizens, government agencies, and private organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, policy makers"},{"Description":"Differences in understanding the notion of critical infrastructure in European Union countries","Impact":"Inconsistencies in critical infrastructure protection and response strategies across EU member states","Mitigation":"Harmonizing definitions and regulations across EU member states","Technologies":"Standardization of definitions, cross-border collaboration, and information sharing","People":"European Union policymakers and regulatory authorities","Owner":"European Union, national governments"},{"Description":"Limited protection to facilities or objects without considering dependencies or interdependencies","Impact":"Increased risk of failure due to overlooked dependencies and interdependencies","Mitigation":"Incorporating dependencies and interdependencies in the understanding and protection of critical infrastructure","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, integrated systems analysis, and dependency mapping","People":"Infrastructure planners, engineers, and risk management professionals","Owner":"Infrastructure planning and regulatory authorities"}]}
